Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Zara
Reviews.Content: Have had this camera for over a year now takes great pictures & is still going strong like the first day we bought it.Great investment :)

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: R. J. Marks
Reviews.Content: this camera works as described and came to me in excellent shape. you would never know this camera was used, it came in the original box with all the cables and books. i just had to add my flash chip to it and batteries and start taking pictures...

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: gabriel sheridan
Reviews.Content: works beautifully  came with everthing they said it would  easy to use. nice camera for the price havent had no problems  with it :)

Reviews.Title: Sanyo Review
Reviews.Author: Gsisak
Reviews.Content: This camera was my sisters old camera that she gave to me. I am taking a photography class and needed something to use. Although it is very out of date it still takes decent pictures and will do everything I need it to do for the class. It is however a little confusing so make sure you read the manual.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Condition
Reviews.Author: Sukari Gladney
Reviews.Content: My daughter age 11 is very impressed with her new camera. She is very creative and I wanted to give her a gift she can use her own gift for..visual art. She will also be traveling to Australia and now has the opportunity to capture her memories.

Reviews.Title: Doesn't Last Long
Reviews.Author: Book Junkie "Corey"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera in August and it had stopped working by October. I probably took no more than 100 pictures with it. Don't waste your money on this one.
